greetingText: I'm so lucky to have met the most beautiful person like you
wishText: May your cheeks stay as fresh as the flowers on your head, may your beautiful smile be like flowers forever, may you always be happy
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday! May happiness and smiles stay with you...
text2: I want you to feel excited...
text4: I know I have to do something
text5Content: you are the most special person to me
replayText: If you like it, you can watch it again by just clicking here...
